parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS module can cause the brakes to malfunction, leading to loss of control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The anti-lock warning light illuminates
the front brake lever fails to depress
the brakes fail to engage
the vehicle is difficult to stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear brake master cylinder can cause the rear brakes to fail, leading to loss of control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The rear brakes fail to engage
the vehicle is difficult to stop
the rear brake pedal feels soft or spongy.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Rear Brake Light Switch Wire Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear brake light switch wires can cause a fire, leading to complete rear brake failure and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The rear brake lights fail to function
the wires catch on fire
the rear brakes fail to engage.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS system can cause the brakes to malfunction, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The brakes do not work at all
the brake pedal feels hard
the rear tire locks up
the ABS module fails
the brakes are unresponsive
the motorcycle is difficult to control or stops suddenly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the engine management system can cause the vehicle to go into limp mode, resulting in reduced power and performance, which can increase the risk of accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The check engine indicator illuminates
the vehicle goes into limp mode
reduced power and performance
difficulty maintaining speed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The defective chrome plating on the motorcycle's components can cause cuts and injuries due to the sharp edges of the peeling chrome, and the pitted rough areas can exacerbate injuries in the event of a collision.
symptoms: Numerous areas of pitting and peeling of chrome on the motorcycle's components
sharp edges of peeling chrome that can inflict cuts
rough surfaces that can cause injuries.
